HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.resume: Passionate and seasoned Software Engineer with a strong focus on frontend development. Proficient in TypeScript and well-versed in all aspects of web technologies. Collaborative team player dedicated to delivering efficient, scalable, and visually appealing web applications.

services.title: Service
services.sub_title: I work as a freelancer to develop exceptional websites for brands, companies, institutions, and startups, focusing on strategic web solutions.

cta.title: Let's work together!
cta.sub_title: I'm open for freelance projects, feel free to email me to see how can we collaborate.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello there! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Ahyar Nasrullah Adilian, a student majoring in Computer Science at the University of Lampung. I have a strong interest in frontend development. With a solid foundation in JavaScript and TypeScript, as well as a comprehensive understanding of various frontend libraries and frameworks, I have navigated the ever-evolving landscape of web development with enthusiasm and dedication.
resume.paragraf_2: I focus on creating web applications that not only provide precise experiences but are also user-friendly. My specialization includes JavaScript and TypeScript, along with frameworks such as React, Vite, and Next.js. As a quick learner and adaptive thinker, I thrive in a dynamic environment where innovation is a driving force. My collaborative nature allows me to seamlessly integrate with teams, contributing not only to my technical skills but also embodying a humble attitude that values input from every team member.
resume.paragraf_3: I strongly believe that effective communication is crucial for success in any role. I am adaptable, think efficiently, and always strive for the best. My experiences have equipped me with analytical skills and strong leadership abilities. I am comfortable working collaboratively in a team and am excited about the opportunity to contribute to team success. Looking forward to the possibility of collaboration!

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Led the team using Scrum methodology and ensured smooth project development processes.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Facilitated communication between stakeholders and the team, while prioritizing the backlog with the Product Owner.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Designed wireframes, mockups, and prototypes based on user research and needs analysis.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Developed a consistent design system and collaborated with developers to ensure proper implementation.
responsibilities.responsibility_5: Built responsive and modern frontend interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS.

career_1.company: Badan Eksekutif Mahasiswa Universitas Lampung (BEM U KBM Unila)

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Lead and coordinate a team in developing creative concepts and promotional materials for various events/programs organized by BEM Unila.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Capturing photos of events, activities, and members to visually document key moments and share them across our platforms, ensuring high-quality images that reflect the spirit and purpose of our organization.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Creating visually appealing and impactful designs for promotional materials, social media posts, event banners, and digital content that align with our branding and communication goals.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Planning, shooting, and producing videos for various organizational needs, including event recaps, promotional videos, and interviews. I work with lighting, framing, and audio techniques to create visually compelling video content.

career_2.company: Himpunan Mahasiswa Ilmu Komputer Universitas Lampung (HIMAKOM UNILA)

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Capturing photos of events, activities, and members to visually document key moments and share them across our platforms, ensuring high-quality images that reflect the spirit and purpose of our organization.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Creating visually appealing and impactful designs for promotional materials, social media posts, event banners, and digital content that align with our branding and communication goals.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Planning, shooting, and producing videos for various organizational needs, including event recaps, promotional videos, and interviews. I work with lighting, framing, and audio techniques to create visually compelling video content.
